cz.ive.process
Interface Substitution

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SubstitutionImpl
public interface Substitution
extends java.lang.Cloneable

Source substitution. Map between SourceId and other Substitution information:

  • Substituted - single IveObject/ set of IveObjects / not yet assigned
  • Obligation - obligatory single / obligatory set / optional single / optional set / variable
  • Type - actor / object
It allows insertion and deletion of substituted objects, easy cloning. Substitution also provides Hook for changes in object assignment.

Author:
Ondra

addSlot

boolean addSlot(java.lang.String sourceId,
                Source source,
                boolean mandatory,
                boolean variable,
                boolean actor,
                LOD setLod)
Method adds Slot into Substitution - version with single source addition.

Parameters:
sourceId - Id of source
source - source which will be stored in slot
mandatory - true when source is mandatory
variable - true when source is variable
actor - true if added slot is slot with actor
setLod - LOD object with constrains of LOD
Returns:
true when new slot successfully added, false when Substitution contains slot with same sourceId

addSlot

boolean addSlot(java.lang.String sourceId,
                Slot slot,
                boolean actor)
Method adds Slot into Substitution. This slot is added as is, so it can be shared with multiple Substitution.

Parameters:
sourceId - Id of source
slot - already created Slot
actor - true if added slot is slot with actor
Returns:
true when new slot successfully added, false when Substitution contains slot with same sourceId

deleteSlot

boolean deleteSlot(java.lang.String sourceId)
Method which deletes slot from substitution.

Parameters:
sourceId - sourceId of slot we want to delete
Returns:
true if slot was deleted from substitution, false when slot with sourceId is not in substitution

Method which returs if slot contains list of Sources.

Parameters:
sourceId - sourceId of Slot we ask for
Returns:
true when Slot contains array of Sources, false when not

Getter for the variable flag (the source can be reassigned during some processes).

Parameters:
sourceId - sourceId of the Slot we ask for.
Returns:
true when the Slot is variable.

Method which returns single Source from slot.

Parameters:
sourceId - sourceId of Slot from which we want to get Source
Returns:
Source when slot with sourceId is in substitution and slot contains single Source, otherwise null

getSourceArray

java.util.ArrayList<Source> getSourceArray(java.lang.String sourceId)
Method which returns array of Sources from slot.

Parameters:
sourceId - sourceId of Slot from which we want to get Source
Returns:
Source when slot with sourceId is in substitution and slot contains array of Sources, otherwise null

setSource

void setSource(java.lang.String sourceId,
               Source source)
Method which sets single Source into Slot in substitution. Slot must exist before setting source.

Parameters:
sourceId - sourceId of slot where we want to set source
source - Source we want to set

Parameters:
sourceId - string name of the source
source - sources to be assigned with given name

clearSource

void clearSource(java.lang.String sourceId)
Remove all sources in slot by given name (source ID). Slot must exist before clearing source.

Parameters:
sourceId - string name of the source

duplicateSubstitution

Substitution duplicateSubstitution(boolean deepCopy)
Method which duplicates instance of substitution.

Parameters:
deepCopy - If true then we duplicate slots stored in substitution too, otherwise only instance of substitution is duplicated
Returns:
duplicated Substitution

changeSubstitution

void changeSubstitution(Substitution subst)
Changes actual substitution along substitution added in parameter. All Sources in Slots which are contained in subst too will be changed with sources containted in subst.

Parameters:
subst - Substitution along which will be instance substitution changed.

checkSubstitution

boolean checkSubstitution(Substitution subst)
Method checks instance of substitution along substitution in parameter. If some slot is not contained in instance substitution and contained in added substitution, or if some slot is mandatory and is empty in instance substitution, then check doesn't pass.

Parameters:
subst - Given template substitution.
Returns:
true when check passed, false otherwise.

getSlotsKeys

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSlotsKeys()
Returns all containted names of slots.

getActorSlotsKeys

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getActorSlotsKeys()
Returns all containted names of slots with actors.

getSlotLod

LOD getSlotLod(java.lang.String sourceId)
Method which returns LOD object of Slot identified by sourceId.

Parameters:
sourceId - string identification of slot
Returns:
LOD LOD of slot, null when slot is not contained in substitution
